title: COVID-19 vaccination clinical information | SA Health
author: Scheme=Aglsterms Aglsagent; Corporatename=Department; Wellbeing; Address=; Adelaide; SA; Contact=
description: Information on COVID-19 vaccination for health professionals and vaccine providers
sitename: scheme=AGLSTERMS.AglsAgent; corporateName=Department for Health and Wellbeing; address=11 Hindmarsh Square, Adelaide, SA, 5000; contact=+61 8 8226 6000
cleaned_text: The Australian Technical Advisory Group on Immunisation (ATAGI) makes recommendations on the use of COVID-19 vaccines in Australia. [Advice for COVID-19 vaccine providers and administrators](https://www.health.gov.au/our-work/covid-19-vaccines/advice-for-providers) is available from the Australian Government Department of Health and Aged Care. COVID-19 vaccination recommendations [ATAGI clinical guidance for COVID-19 vaccine providers](https://www.health.gov.au/our-work/covid-19-vaccines/advice-for-providers/clinical-guidance) provides information on administering COVID-19 vaccines to eligible patients, advice about rare side effects, contraindications, precautions and adverse effects. [HeathPathways South Australia](/wps/wcm/connect/public+content/sa+health+internet/clinical+resources/for+gps/healthpathways+south+australia/healthpathways+south+australia) also provides COVID-19 vaccination information to general practitioners in South Australia. Clinical advice [Vaccinating your patients against COVID-19](https://www.health.gov.au/our-work/covid-19-vaccines/advice-for-providers/vaccinating-patients) [Clinical precautions](https://www.health.gov.au/our-work/covid-19-vaccines/advice-for-providers/clinical-guidance/contraindications-and-precautions) [Vaccine efficacy and effectiveness](https://www.health.gov.au/our-work/covid-19-vaccines/advice-for-providers/clinical-guidance/product-information) COVID-19 Vaccination Training Program Management of COVID-19 vaccines [Vaccine allocations, storage and handling](https://www.health.gov.au/our-work/covid-19-vaccines/advice-for-providers/allocations-storage-handling) [Transporting, storage and handling](https://www.health.gov.au/our-work/covid-19-vaccines/advice-for-providers/clinical-guidance/transporting-storing-and-handling) [National Vaccine Storage Guidelines](https://www.health.gov.au/resources/collections/national-vaccine-storage-guidelines-resource-collection) For further information on the management of COVID-19 vaccines visit the [Vaccine Storage](/wps/wcm/connect/public+content/sa+health+internet/clinical+resources/clinical+programs+and+practice+guidelines/immunisation+for+health+professionals/vaccine+ordering+and+storage/vaccine+storage) page or contact the SA Health Clinical Advisory Service on [1300 232 272](tel:1300232272). Vaccination reporting For further information or to report a program error, contact the SA Health Clinical Advisory Service on [1300 232 272](tel:1300232272).
